characterList: 典氏紙昏婚低底民眠甫補博搏都部郎鄉

characters.story: The strokes unite to show canon, whispering "Dyan" softly - a vivid image to remember!
"Shir!" The clan line commanded sharply - stating the family name, the maiden name!
The thread stands for paper, whispering "Jir" softly - a vivid image to remember!
"Hwun!" The sun set on the family name cheerfully - dusk, nightfall, twilight turning dark!
The strokes unite to show marriage, singing "Hwun!" cheerfully!
The person stands for low, singing "Dee!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
A striking symbol for bottom that whispers "Dee" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The people takes the shape of people, asking "Min? Citizen?" curiously!
"Myan, are you sleeping?" The people's eyes questioned slumber curiously - time to rest!
The field takes the shape of fu3, whispering "Foo" softly - a vivid image to remember!
Picture to patch taking form - it whispers "Boo" with vivid energy!
Picture knowledgeable taking form - it asks "Bwo? Extensive?" with vivid energy!
"Bwo, should we fight?" The knowledgeable hand questioned wrestling curiously - ready to combat and seize!
Picture metropolis taking form - it sings "Doh!" with vivid energy!
A striking symbol for department that shouts "Boo!" sharply!
This character represents young man, asking "Lahng, is that the youth?" curiously!
This character represents countryside, singing "Shyahng!" cheerfully!
